prompt: A friend invites you to a large party tonight, but you planned to read. Do you go out or stay in?
When meeting new people, do you prefer initiating conversations or letting others approach you first?
Your team needs a volunteer to lead a presentation. Do you step up or suggest someone else?
You have free time: join a community event or work on a personal project alone?
At a networking event, do you approach strangers confidently or stay with familiar colleagues?
A colleague disagrees with your idea. Do you debate assertively or seek compromise quietly?
Weekend plans: group hiking trip or solo art project? Which do you suggest to a friend?
At a workshop, do you ask questions publicly or research answers independently later?
Your friend wants advice: host a lively game night or a small, relaxed dinner?
When brainstorming ideas, do you prefer group discussions or individual reflection first?
